name: Cafeteria

features.interactive_text: It's like an amorphous burger, but tastes like wood ash.

actions.eat: Don't do it, Morty! You're going to regret this...

features.interactive_text: Grits? Hominy? I have no idea what this pasty stuff is.

actions.eat: Oh jeeze, Morty! You threw up Morty! Oh man that's foul!

actions.poke: My finger's stuck in it. Aggh, that is vile. Maybe we should travel to an alternate-universe-Blips-And-Chitz with better food!

longform: The only downside about this place is the food: I'm not gonna lie, Morty, it's pretty gross. They've, uh, they've got flembleggers, an-an-and spargeglur, and like, a lotta gross stuff Morty.
shortform: You're waaaaaay too hungry, Morty. There is probably no good reason for us to come here again.
long_description_exit: Couldn't pay me all the *urp* scheckles in the world to eat this stuff. Even Time Prison isn't as-as-as bad as this.
short_description_exit: I wouldn't even feed this stuff to Jerry.
